engine.rendering

Class SpriteSheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.rendering.SpriteSheet

  • public class SpriteSheet
extends java.lang.Object
    A 2D sheet containing various sprites.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteSheet

        public SpriteSheet(Texture spriteSheet,
           int spritesPerX,
           int spritesPerY,
           int spriteBorderSize)
        Creates a SpriteSheet
        Parameters:
        spriteSheet - The texture containing the sprites
        spritesPerX - Number of sprites on the X axis.
        spritesPerY - Number of sprites on the Y axis.
        spriteBorderSize - The number of pixels bordering each sprite on all sides.

        public int getPixelIndex(int spriteIndex,
                int x,
                int y)
        Gets the index of a particular pixel of a sprite in the sprite sheet texture.
        Parameters:
        spriteIndex - The index of the sprite in the sprite sheet.
        x - The location of the pixel in the sprite on X.
        y - The location of the pixel in the sprite on Y.
        Returns:
        The index of a pixel of a sprite in the sprite sheet texture.

      • getAABB

        public AABB getAABB(int index,
           double width,
           double height)
        Returns an AABB that tightly bounds a particular sprite.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the sprite in the sprite sheet.
        width - The scaled width of the AABB.
        height - The scaled height of the AABB.
        Returns:
        An AABB that tightly bounds a particular sprite.
